mdRecord.dcterms:description: Family. FIRST ROW: Morris Edward Clements, Forrest Brown, Vernel Clements, Flosie Clements, Susie Beasley. SECOND ROW: Selina Clements Brown, Wilbur Clements, Susie Clements Vess, John Martin Clements, James W. Clements, Mattie Clements Beasley, George Beasley. THIRD ROW: Andrew Brown, Aulus Bledsoe Clements, Hanah Clements, Ada Clements, Mabel Clements, Allen Clements.
This image is identical to image number X03308B; therefore, this record has been shadowed from the public. emg2j
